title: Expedition
description: Snofluff the Polar Cub was up and at 'em early this morning. The weather was clear and the sun was shining on the fresh snow that had fallen overnight. He and his best friend, Pablo the Puffin, set out for a Saturday expedition. What would they encounter on their journey through the Canadian tundra? Decisions must be made, and their fate may hang in the balance. Come along as Snofluff and Pablo explore the wilderness and learn a few important lessons along the way.
author: J.M. Getts
